multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of the dialogue manager in the chatbot system?
choices: To transcribe the user\'s speech into text.
To generate all possible responses to a user\'s utterance.
To combine the responses from different models and select the most appropriate one.
To analyze the user\'s sentiment and emotional state.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the parameter  Î³ in the discounted sum of rewards formula represent?
choices: The learning rate of the reinforcement learning algorithm.
The temperature parameter controlling the entropy of the policy distribution.
The discount factor, which determines the importance of future rewards.
The number of candidate responses generated by the response models.

multiple_choice_question.text: How many hidden layers does the neural network architecture used for the model selection policies have?
choices: Two
Three
Four
Five

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the objective function being optimized in the training of the Supervised AMT scoring model?
choices: Mean squared error between predicted and actual Alexa user scores.
Log-likelihood (cross-entropy) to predict the AMT label classes.
The expected cumulative return (discounted sum of rewards).
The perplexity of the model on a validation set.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the variable  zt represent in the Abstract Discourse Markov Decision Process?
choices: The full dialogue history up to the current time step.
A discrete random variable representing the abstract discourse state of the dialogue.
The action taken by the system (i.e. the selected response) at the current time step.
The sampled AMT label for the candidate response at the current time step.
